title: Riot Games Username Assistance email
body:
I've gotten this same email twice in the last couple months...
Subject Line: "Riot Games Username Assistance"
Body: "Below you will find the accounts associated with your email address:"
Thing is, I'm pretty sure I didn't request that info. It may have been a misclick somewhere along the line, but I don't think that's it. It doesn't give any links to follow or try to get my to log in, like a scam. Does it just mean someone somewhere is trying to find a way into my account? I believe both times were right after I purchased rp.

replies.body: It does sound pretty phishy, check out our [emails from riot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games)to double check.  Just to be safe, I recommend[ securing your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account), including resetting your lol and email passwords!
Seems to be legit, but I'm guessing that means someone is sending the request for info for me. I will secure my account. Thank you. :)
